entry.title: First Day Home
entry.text: Baby Emma had a good first day at home. Mostly sleeping and eating every 2-3 hours. Changed 6 wet diapers today.

entry.title: Night Feeding Schedule
entry.text: Cluster feeding in the evening. Woke up 4 times during the night. Had 8 wet diapers and 3 soiled ones.

entry.title: First Bath at Home
entry.text: Had our first bath at home! Emma cried at first but then seemed to enjoy it. Feeding well, took about 75ml per session.

entry.title: Pediatrician Visit
entry.text: First check-up went well. Doctor says weight gain is on track. Had 7 wet diapers today.

entry.title: Longer Sleep Stretch
entry.text: Got a 4-hour sleep stretch! Had good feeding sessions today. Alert during tummy time.

entry.title: First Smile
entry.text: We saw what might have been first real smile! Eating well, 8 wet diapers. Started doing 90ml per feed.

entry.title: One Week Home
entry.text: One week milestone! Good appetite, sleeping 2-3 hour stretches. Had umbilical cord check, healing nicely.
